statements: SELECT simulation_name, algorithm_used FROM simulations;
SELECT * FROM simulations WHERE simulation_id = 1;
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_description FROM simulations WHERE algorithm_used = 'A';
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_name, test_scenario FROM simulations WHERE algorithm_used = 'B' ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT simulation_name, performance_metrics -> 'accuracy' as accuracy FROM simulations WHERE test_scenario = 'scenario_1';
SELECT simulation_name, algorithm_used, test_scenario FROM simulations WHERE simulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM simulations WHERE algorithm_used = 'Genetic Algorithm';
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_description FROM simulations WHERE test_scenario = 'Scenario A' AND algorithm_used = 'Neural Network';
SELECT * FROM simulations WHERE simulation_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT simulation_name, performance_metrics->'accuracy' AS accuracy FROM simulations WHERE algorithm_used = 'Decision Tree' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM simulations;
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_name FROM simulations WHERE simulation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM test_scenarios;
SELECT scenario_name, test_type FROM test_scenarios WHERE scenario_id = 1;
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_date FROM simulations ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM simulations
SELECT simulation_name, simulation_date FROM simulations WHERE simulation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT simulation_name, test_type FROM simulations INNER JOIN test_scenarios ON simulations.simulation_id = test_scenarios.scenario_id
SELECT * FROM test_scenarios WHERE scenario_name LIKE '%scenario%'
SELECT MAX(simulation_date) AS latest_date FROM simulations
SELECT * FROM simulations;
SELECT simulation_name, description, simulation_date FROM simulations ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM testing_scenarios WHERE scenario_name = 'Highway';
SELECT scenario_name, testing_date FROM testing_scenarios WHERE testing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_description FROM autonomous_driving_algorithms ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM simulations WHERE simulation_name = 'Simulation A';
SELECT id, description, simulation_date FROM simulations WHERE simulation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT algorithm_name, algorithm_description FROM autonomous_driving_algorithms WHERE algorithm_name LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT * FROM testing_scenarios WHERE testing_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY testing_date DESC;
SELECT id, scenario_name FROM testing_scenarios JOIN simulations ON testing_scenarios.id = simulations.id;
SELECT * FROM simulation_results;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_name FROM algorithm_parameters ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT scenario_id, scenario_description, road_conditions FROM test_scenarios WHERE weather_conditions='sunny';
SELECT algorithm_id, AVG(execution_time) AS average_execution_time FROM algorithm_performance GROUP BY algorithm_id;
SELECT simulation_id, start_time, end_time, success FROM simulation_results WHERE distance_covered > 100 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM simulation_results;
SELECT algorithm_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM algorithm_parameters ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT scenario_id, scenario_description FROM test_scenarios WHERE road_conditions = 'Wet';
SELECT algorithm_id, simulation_id, success FROM algorithm_performance WHERE execution_time > 5 ORDER BY success ASC, execution_time DESC;

SELECT algorithm_name, COUNT(*) AS num_simulations FROM algorithm_performance INNER JOIN algorithm_parameters ON algorithm_performance.algorithm_id = algorithm_parameters.algorithm_id GROUP BY algorithm_name HAVING num_simulations > 2;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM Vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensor WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT scenario_name, description FROM Scenario WHERE scenario_id = 3;
SELECT algorithm_name, accuracy FROM Algorithm WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Simulation WHERE status='completed';
SELECT scenario_name, start_time, end_time FROM Simulation WHERE status='running';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM Vehicle ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT algorithm_name, description, accuracy FROM Algorithm WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, installation_date, Vehicle.vehicle_type FROM Sensor JOIN Vehicle ON Sensor.vehicle_id = Vehicle.vehicle_id;
